Name: Escape the Ninja Room
About the game: The Japanese-style “Ninja Room” has some mysteries. You must solve these mysteries and escape from Ninja Room. how to play: ・Click on the place of interest to find out. ・Select an item and click where you want to use it. ・Select an item and click the magnifying glass to see details of the item. ・You can move the viewpoint by dragging while holding down the left mouse button. Feature： ■ Simple operability ■ Japanese style room ■ multiple of mystery and tricks ■ Relax and play ■ You can also play “10 clock” As an added bonus to this game, you can also play the escape game “10 clock”. In this game, find 10 hidden clocks and escape from the room.
